mymetal.universal.index package

Submodules

mymetal.universal.index.indextrans module

indextrans submodule

This submodule contains functions for converting between three-index and four-index notation for HCP crystals.

Functions:

  • three_index_to_four_index: Converts a three-index notation to a four-index notation for HCP crystals, or vice versa.

mymetal.universal.index.indextrans.three_index_to_four_index(index: list = None, reverse: bool = False) → list

Converts a three-index notation to a four-index notation for HCP crystals, or vice versa.

Parameters:

  • index (list) – A list of three elements [U, V, W] for forward conversion or four elements [u, v, t, w] for reverse conversion.

  • reverse (bool) – If True, converts from four-index to three-index notation. If False, converts from three-index to four-index notation.

Returns:

A list representing the converted index.

Return type:

list

Raises:

ValueError – If the index is None or does not have the correct number of elements for the specified conversion direction.

Module contents

index module

This module is used to generate and convert between different types of indices used in the mymetal package.

Modules:

  • indextrans: Contains functions for converting between three-index and four-index notation for HCP crystals.
